items.sentence: Tom assumed Mary was hiding something from him.
I didn\'t just make the plan, I carried it out.
I didn\'t know Tom wanted to do that on Monday.
You\'re the only person I know who can\'t swim.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary had parked her car.
Tom didn\'t know whether he was right or wrong.
Tom didn\'t know who to deliver the package to.
Tom didn\'t learn to drive until he was thirty.
Tom didn\'t love Mary as much as she loved him.
Tom didn\'t manage to answer all the questions.
Aren\'t you going to be in Boston this weekend?

Tom goes to Boston three or four times a month.
Tom goes to bed at the same time every evening.
